text: Delphine Saubaber (born 1978, in Agen) is a French journalist. == Career == Saubader is a graduate of the Institut d'études politiques de Paris (1999). and of the of Paris.Fiche sur franceinter.fr She performed her first internship at the Sud Ouest agency in Agen.« Delphine Saubaber, lauréate du prix Albert-Londres, originaire d'Agen », Sud Ouest She then worked for Le Monde, before joining the world service at L'Express as senior reporter.Fiche sur le site du théâtre du Rond-PointFiche sur le site des éditions Stock In 2010, Saubader was awarded the Albert Londres Prize.« Delphine Saubaber remporte le prix Albert-Londres », Libération == Works == *2011: *2016: == References == == External links == * Le pays empoisonné on Eyrolles * List of articles in L'Express * Delphine Saubaber on Dailymotion Category:1978 births Category:People from Agen Category:Living people Category:Sciences Po alumni Category:21st-century French journalists Category:French women journalists Category:Albert Londres Prize recipients
title: Delphine Saubaber
